nodes.text: The Umbaran shadow cloak, also known as the Umbaran garb, was a traditional garment of the Umbarans, or "Shadow People." A voluminous cloak made up of numerous strands that made it look as if it had been spun from feathers, it appeared white but was in fact patterned in ultraviolet colors, which the Umbarans could see. Sly Moore, an Umbaran female who served as an aide to Supreme Chancellor Palpatine of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars, wore a shadow cloak.
